label: cascading_failure_01_dx_storage_capacity_009
content:
## 2026-01-10 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /storage/cluster_capacity: REQUESTS req | p50: 120ms p95: 250ms p99: 400ms | err: 0.2% (2 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/node_utilization: REQUESTS req | p50: 80ms p95: 200ms p99: 350ms | err: 0.1% (1 error) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/rebalance: REQUESTS req | p50: 100ms p95: 220ms p99: 370ms | err: 0.3% (3 errors) | success: 99.7%
- /storage/compaction: REQUESTS req | p50: 90ms p95: 210ms p99: 340ms | err: 0.2% (2 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/io: REQUESTS req | p50: 85ms p95: 215ms p99: 360ms | err: 0.2% (2 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/storage_efficiency: REQUESTS req | p50: 75ms p95: 190ms p99: 330ms | err: 0.1% (1 error) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/backup_verification: REQUESTS req | p50: 70ms p95: 180ms p99: 310ms | err: 0.2% (2 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/quota_enforcement: REQUESTS req | p50: 65ms p95: 170ms p99: 290ms | err: 0.1% (1 error) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/ingest: REQUESTS req | p50: 60ms p95: 160ms p99: 280ms | err: 0.1% (1 error) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/reliability: REQUESTS req | p50: 55ms p95: 150ms p99: 260ms | err: 0.1% (1 error) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/metadata: REQUESTS req | p50: 50ms p95: 140ms p99: 240ms | err: 0.1% (1 error) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/maintenance: REQUESTS req | p50: 45ms p95: 130ms p99: 220ms | err: 0.1% (1 error) | success: 99.9%

### Infrastructure
- stor-a-09: CPU 82% | Mem 83% | Disk Used 98% | Disk Busy 95% | Conns: 120 | Net: 8.7/7.6 Gbps
- stor-b-16: CPU 65% | Mem 72% | Disk Used 94% | Disk Busy 90% | Conns: 95 | Net: 6.9/6.2 Gbps
- stor-c-07: CPU 59% | Mem 69% | Disk Used 91% | Disk Busy 84% | Conns: 80 | Net: 5.6/5.1 Gbps
- meta-02: CPU 64% | Mem 88% | Disk Used 81% | Disk Busy 68% | Conns: 60 | Net: 3.2/2.6 Gbps

### Connection Pools
- rebalance_pool: active 12 | idle 3 | waiting 2 | exhaustion 0 | max 20 | avg_wait 45ms
- ingest_pool: active 8 | idle 4 | waiting 1 | exhaustion 0 | max 15 | avg_wait 30ms
- metadata_pool: active 10 | idle 5 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 15 | avg_wait 20ms
- replication_pool: active 14 | idle 2 | waiting 3 | exhaustion 1 | max 20 | avg_wait 50ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 92% | Bandwidth: 2.5 Gbps | Origin requests: 1500

### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] Hottest node approached 99% utilization on stor-a-09: 98.6%
- [WARNING] Snapshot verification failure on storage system: 1 failure
- [WARNING] Quota hard blocks triggered for 3 tenants
- [INFO] Deep scrub and replica compare scheduled overnight due to scrub errors

### Deployments & Changes
- Initiated targeted rebalance from stor-a-09 to underutilized nodes
- Repaired snapshot manifest index after verification failure
- Guided tenants to move archival data to erasure-coded pool
- Re-enabled writes post quota blocks
- Scheduled deep scrub and replica compare overnight

### Events
- Hottest node approached 99% utilization; launched targeted rebalance from stor-a-09 to underutilized nodes and set alert at 98.5%
- One snapshot verification failure due to missing snapshot manifest entry; repaired manifest index and re-verified successfully
- Quota hard blocks triggered for three tenants during batch loads; guided teams to move archival data to erasure-coded pool and re-enabled writes
- Scrub error count increased; correlated to same 6 placement groups and scheduled deep scrub plus replica compare overnight

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: Noor A. 6 pages. 11 tickets. Status: Degraded; immediate risk is hottest-node utilization. Rebalance in progress and quotas actively managed to protect headroom
